text: is there a way to add invoices to a deal using the API? and if not, what's the next best thing? I have an invoice taken from an outside system that doesn't integrate with HubSpot well, and it has it's own invoice url and pdf and whatnot, I just want to be able to take the invoice url and the amount and name of the invoice and create that within HubSpot in a way that it updates the amount of value of the deal and shows me transaction history

Hi , all
I want to inform you that we are facing this issue , in creating the unique object property in contact .

Unique properties creation working from UI of HubSpot , not working the same by api call , that we made from node.js api client or HubSpot developer api .

This below references says that we can create , unique object property inside contact column
Reference link:-
1.change log:-  Unique Properties support for newly created Contact properties (<http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com>)
2.HubSpot doc:- <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties#create-unique-identifier-properties>



See the images attached to know what response getting when trying to create unique property , even on passing hasUniqueValue:true explicitly , its retunning the false

1st image =  I have tried to create HubSpot unique property with same payload being used by HubSpot api in img 2

2nd image = creation of unique properties inside HubSpot through ui of HubSpot and their network call and payload img .

I feel its a HubSpot API problem , because with the same payload , its not able to create unique property , as given in the doc. and in the HubSpot ui api being used .

Other developer also facing the same issue , see the below link:- <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Create-unique-identifier-for-Contact/m-p/896782#M69890>

Any help on this will be a great help .
